member.name: STATSTG
member.summary: TheSTATSTG structure contains statistical data about an open storage, stream, or byte-array object. This structure is used in the,,, and interfaces.

member.name: STATSTG.pwcsName
member.summary: A pointer to a NULL-terminated Unicode string that contains the name. Space for this string is allocated by the method called and freed by the caller (for more information, see). To not return this member, specify the STATFLAG_NONAME value when you call a method that returns aSTATSTG structure, except for calls to , which provides no way to specify this value.

member.name: STATSTG.type
member.summary: Indicates the type of storage object. This is one of the values from the enumeration.

member.name: STATSTG.cbSize
member.summary: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the stream or byte array.

member.name: STATSTG.mtime
member.summary: Indicates the last modification time for this storage, stream, or byte array.

member.name: STATSTG.ctime
member.summary: Indicates the creation time for this storage, stream, or byte array.

member.name: STATSTG.atime
member.summary: Indicates the last access time for this storage, stream, or byte array.

member.name: STATSTG.grfMode
member.summary: Indicates the access mode specified when the object was opened. This member is only valid in calls toStat methods.

member.name: STATSTG.grfLocksSupported
member.summary: Indicates the types of region locking supported by the stream or byte array. For more information about the values available, see the enumeration. This member is not used for storage objects.

member.name: STATSTG.clsid
member.summary: Indicates the class identifier for the storage object; set to CLSID_NULL for new storage objects. This member is not used for streams or byte arrays.

member.name: STATSTG.grfStateBits
member.summary: Indicates the current state bits of the storage object; that is, the value most recently set by the method. This member is not valid for streams or byte arrays.
